text:
On Thursday, April 22, 2021 at 10 A.M. EDT join @PRRIpoll and @ifyc for a discussion on the new, joint survey, "Faith Based Approaches Can Positively Impact #COVID19 #Vaccine Efforts: Religious Identities and the Race Against the Virus." 

Register here! https://t.co/Cvr9uyb6K5 https://t.co/GXcoKuX5GP
